t: To the chief Musician{H5329}{(H8764)} on Neginoth{H5058} upon Sheminith{H8067}, A Psalm{H4210} of David{H1732}. O LORD{H3068}, rebuke{H3198}{(H8686)} me not in thine anger{H639}, neither chasten{H3256}{(H8762)} me in thy hot displeasure{H2534}.
Have mercy{H2603}{(H8798)} upon me, O LORD{H3068}; for I am weak{H536}: O LORD{H3068}, heal{H7495}{(H8798)} me; for my bones{H6106} are vexed{H926}{(H8738)}.
My soul{H5315} is also sore{H3966} vexed{H926}{(H8738)}: but thou, O LORD{H3068}, how long?
Return{H7725}{(H8798)}, O LORD{H3068}, deliver{H2502}{(H8761)} my soul{H5315}: oh save{H3467}{(H8685)} me for thy mercies{H2617}' sake.
For in death{H4194} there is no remembrance{H2143} of thee: in the grave{H7585} who shall give thee thanks{H3034}{(H8686)}?
I am weary{H3021}{(H8804)} with my groaning{H585}; all the night{H3915} make I my bed{H4296} to swim{H7811}{(H8686)}; I water{H4529}{(H8686)} my couch{H6210} with my tears{H1832}.
Mine eye{H5869} is consumed{H6244}{(H8804)} because of grief{H3708}; it waxeth old{H6275}{(H8804)} because of all mine enemies{H6887}{(H8802)}.
Depart{H5493}{(H8798)} from me, all ye workers{H6466}{(H8802)} of iniquity{H205}; for the LORD{H3068} hath heard{H8085}{(H8804)} the voice{H6963} of my weeping{H1065}.
The LORD{H3068} hath heard{H8085}{(H8804)} my supplication{H8467}; the LORD{H3068} will receive{H3947}{(H8799)} my prayer{H8605}.
Let all mine enemies{H341}{(H8802)} be ashamed{H954}{(H8799)} and sore{H3966} vexed{H926}{(H8735)}: let them return{H7725}{(H8799)} and be ashamed{H954}{(H8799)} suddenly{H7281}.
